response.overview: When a group of teenagers decides to quench their curiosity of the mystical by breaking into the school and conjuring up a spirit, nothing could prepare them for the gruesome fight they faced ahead. In this entirely student-made sequel to the 2012 film Last Night Forever, ordinary teens must find a way to rid themselves of the spirit of the crazed serial killer responsible for the massacre the school had seen 5 years beforehand. The students must beat the regular ingredients of high school drama: Love, Gossip, Confusion and Betrayal. But unlike most, the terror-stricken students must also face enemies they've never faced before: Voodoo, Murder and SACRIFICE
response.title: Last Night Forever 2
